name: phaser-flappy-bird
description: The flappy bird game implement by phaser
author: Smadey <smadey@163.com>

scripts.copy: rm -rf ../../Projects/smadey.github.io/game/flappy-bird && mkdir ../../Projects/smadey.github.io/game/flappy-bird && (cp -R dist ../../Projects/smadey.github.io/game/flappy-bird & cp -R assets ../../Projects/smadey.github.io/game/flappy-bird & cp index.html ../../Projects/smadey.github.io/game/flappy-bird)
